name: DUO KIE
description:
DUO KIE is a hybrid between skateboard and longboard. Its size and width give the board the stability required for freeriding. Its kicks and concave allow maximum use of skate tricks. The arrangement of the fibres and the wood used give it an extraordinary pop and extreme resistance.

Description:

Laminated longboard sk8

Birchwood laminate + Triaxial eco fibre + eco epoxy + graphic

Birchwood laminate: 8 sheets of birchwood

Triaxial eco fibre: Fibre extracted from the planets most abundant volcanic rocks. This fibre is 50% more resistant than conventional fibre.

Eco epoxy: Resin developed in U.S.A. by Supersap by recycling process. This epoxy is 30% more resistant than other resins.

-Length: 96cm / 37.8"
-With: 22.5cm / 8.9"
-Cóncave: 0.75cm / 0.3"
-Nose: 2.3cm / 0.9"
-Tail: 2.3cm / 0.9"
-Wheelbase: 67.5cm / 26.6"
-Flex: Med
-Weight: 1.9Kg / 3.8Lb

name: Wally - Laminate
description:
A Board with a very good relation betwen Price/Ride, this afordable line are the best Lowcost choice. its construction permits very low production cost but still having good performance.
Its camber its an awesome feeling and its almost canceled when step the board, this board its perfect for sliding.

Description:
Birch Laminated freeride longboard sk8

Construction:
- Birch wood + Biaxial Fiberglass 
- Eco epoxy
- Slick Graphics Scratch resistant
- Shape: 3D Camber
- Flex: Soft - Med

Measures:
- Length: 96 cm / 37.8"
- Width:23 cm / 9.2"
- Concave:0.9 cm / 0.36"
- Nose:1 cm / 0.4"
- Tail: 1 cm / 0.4"
- Wheelbase:70.5 cm / 27.8"
- Flex: Soft
- Weight 1.4 KG / 3.08 Lb

Styles:
 Freeride    5
 Freestyle  4
 Carve       3
 Slide        4
 Downhill    2

Deck Only 

+++++++FREE SHIPING++++++++

name: Rasta - Bamboo
description:
Rasta is conceived for freeride. Thanks to its camber, which is canceled when stepping on the board and its progressive concave you will be able to perform slides more easily. The nose and tail kicks make the board highly maneuverable in the city. The tri-axal eco-fibre in conjunction with the bamboo make this board one of the most noble and soft of the Opiate boards. Due to it's dimensions mid to high velocities are possible.

Description:

Bambu freeride longboard sk8

Construction:
- Double V-lam bambu core + triaxial Rock Fiber
- Eco epoxy
- Slick Graphics Scratch resistant
- Shape: 3D Camber
- Flex: Soft

Deck Only 

+++++++FREE SHIPING++++++++

name: Whale - bamboo
description:
Whale is conceived for freeride. Thanks to its camber which is canceled when stepping on the board and its progressive concave you will be able to perform slides more easily. The nose and tail kicks make the board highly maneuverable in the city. The placement of the tri-axal eco-fibre with the bamboo lend a resistant flex and soft fluid movement as the fibres absorb and distribute your weight throughout the board. High velocities are made possible by its dimensions and flex.

name: Toxic - Bamboo
description:
Toxic is designed purely for freestyle, symmetrical with very pronounced nose and tail kicks so that you can enjoy the length of the board while maximising the capacity for freestyle, groundlevel tricks. Good carving thanks to a concave which accentuates at the ends of the board for a better grip. Conceived for aggressive use its flex and shape allow high velocities with maximum security and stability. Perfect for pools and parks.

Description:

Bambu freeride longboard sk8

Construction:
- Double V-lam bambu core + triaxial Rock Fiber
- Eco epoxy
- Slick Graphics Scratch resistant
- Shape: 3D Camber
- Flex: Med-Hard

name: Sweet - Bamboo
description:
Sweet is Opiate's pintail model. Perfect for carving, its concave design makes it easy to slide and its large kicktail allows you to play around and overcome the small obstacles of the city. It's lenght allows for a certain mobility on the surface of the board, very comfortable in open spaces without reaching the highest velocities. The eco-fibre used in construction give much more resistence than other fibres and so the board maintains a soft and playfull flex which you can configure according to the distance between the trucks.

Description:

Bamboo pintail longboard sk8

Construction:
- Double V-lam bambu core + triaxial Rock Fiber
- Eco epoxy
- Slick Graphics Scratch resistant
- Shape: 3D Camber
- Flex: Soft-Med

Measures:
-Length: 103cm / 40.6”
-Width: 23 cm / 9”
-Concave: 1.2 cm / 0.5”
-Nose: 0.5 cm / 0.2”
-Tail: 4.5 cm / 1.8” 
-Wheelbase: 62, 64.5 cm / 24.4“, 25.4”
-Flex: Med - Soft
-Weight: 1.4 Kg / 3.08 Lb

Styles:
Freeride 3
Freestyle 2
Carve 5
Slide 3
Downhill 0

Deck Only

+++++++FREE SHIPING++++++++

name: Monkey Totem - Street Snowboard
description:
STREET/JIB DECKS

Flex: 4 scale 1-10

It's a Funny Board for jibbing with a nice and soft flex. It's the right board to hit Urban obstacles and to the park, or get good moments with friends on the mountain.

CONSTRUCTION
   
Base: ISO 7500 - Hardest material with a enormous consistent, very durable and fast.   

Fibers: Biaxial + Triaxial provides a good torsion for jibing that you need for boxes and rails   

Wood: Fast grow trees (nature friendly) Paulownia mixed with Poplar for more consistence on landings, and incredible POP

Reinforcements:   Carbon Beams all over the board special placed for stability on landings and pop to fly  Kevlar under foot area to provide board resistance on rails

Sidewall: ABS

name: Panda - Big Air Snowboard
description:
BIG AIR DECKS

Flex: 6/7 scale 1-10  
 
This Construction is the ultimate on a Big Air Board innovation by Opiate, its unique core construction Poplar + Paulownia + Beech (with bamboo Stringers) plus the right fibers get the job done on the park where people are brave.

CONSTRUCTION

Base: ISO 7500 - Hardest material with a enormous consistent, very durable and fast.
   
Fibers: Triaxial for the best performance, trust on landings
   
Wood: Fast grow trees (nature friendly) Poplar + Beech (the soul of POP) + paulownia. It´s our Bomb Drop proof Wood core.

Reinforcements:  Carbon Beams at the tail area special placed for stability on landings and POP to fly. Kevlar under foot area to provide board resistance on rails.

Sidewall: ABS

clear finishing
ecological
